extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
Each Wave of Light Structure Deck contains:
1 Preconstructed Deck of 41 cards
2 Ultra Rares
3 Super Rares
36 Commons
1 Common Token
1 Beginner's Guide
1 Double-sided Playmat/Dueling Guide

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
This card can be used as a "Synthetic Seraphim Token".
*If used for another Token, apply that Token's Type/Attribute/Level/ATK/DEF.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish up to 2 other LIGHT Fairy monsters from your field and/or GY; add from your Deck to your hand, Level 2 or lower LIGHT Fairy monsters with different names, except "Eva", equal to the number of monsters banished this way. You can only use this effect of "Eva" once per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If you activate a Counter Trap Card, OR if you negate the activation of a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect (except during the Damage Step): You can banish 2 other Fairy monsters from your hand, field and/or GY; Special Summon this card from the GY (if it was there when you activated/negated) or hand (even if not). If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: You can add 1 "Parshath" card or 1 Counter Trap from your Deck to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Each time a Counter Trap Card is activated, this card gains 500 ATK immediately after it resolves, also, if "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is on the field, add 1 Counter Trap with a different name from that activated card from your GY to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If you negate the activation of a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect: Add 1 LIGHT Fairy monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Power Angel Valkyria" once per turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 "Airknight Parshath" you control. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing Battle Damage to your opponent. When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: Draw 1 card. While "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is on the field and your Life Points are higher than your opponent's, this card gains ATK and DEF equal to the difference in Life Points.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Draw 1 card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Each time a Counter Trap Card is activated, gain 1000 Life Points, and if "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is face-up on the field, destroy 1 card your opponent controls.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can add 1 Counter Trap Card from your Graveyard to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Each time a Counter Trap Card is activated, draw 1 card immediately after it resolves.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Add 2 of your removed from play Fairy-Type monsters to your hand each time a Counter Trap Card is activated.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value:
Pendulum Effect: Apply these effects.
• You do not pay LP to activate Counter Trap Cards.
• You do not discard to activate Counter Trap Cards.
Monster Effect: If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can reveal 3 Counter Trap Cards from your Deck, your opponent chooses 1 for you to add to your hand, and you shuffle the rest back into your Deck.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If you have exactly 4 Fairy-Type monsters in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If Summoned this way: Target 1 Fairy-Type monster in your Graveyard; add that target to your hand. Neither player can Special Summon monsters. If this face-up card would be sent from the field to the Graveyard, place it on top of the Deck, instead.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: All non-Fairy-Type monsters lose 500 ATK and DEF. The activation and effects of Spell/Trap Cards you control cannot be negated.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Each time a Fairy-Type monster(s) is Summoned: Inflict 600 damage to your opponent. Once per turn: You can send 1 face-up Fairy-Type monster you control to the Graveyard, except "Athena", then target 1 Fairy-Type monster in your Graveyard, except "Athena"; Special Summon that target.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: While this card is face-up on the field, when you draw a Fairy-Type monster(s), you can reveal 1 of those monsters to draw 1 more card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can discard this card to the Graveyard; add 1 "Valhalla, Hall of the Fallen" from your Deck to your hand.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: This card cannot be destroyed by battle. When this card's controller takes any damage, destroy this face-up card. This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Summon of a LIGHT Fairy-Type monster.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, you can Special Summon 1 LIGHT Fairy-Type monster with 1500 or less ATK from your Deck. If "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is face-up on the field, you can Special Summon 1 "Airknight Parshath" instead.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: During your Main Phase: You can return this face-up card from the field to the hand. During the Damage Step, when a LIGHT monster you control battles (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY; that monster gains ATK equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling, until the end of this turn.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: During either player's turn, when an effect of an opponent's monster is activated: You can send this card and 1 other Fairy-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: During either player's turn, when your opponent activates a Spell Card: You can send this card and 1 other Fairy-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: During either player's turn, when your opponent activates a Trap Card: You can send this card and 1 other Fairy-Type monster from your hand to the Graveyard; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 Level 1 LIGHT monster in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: You can Special Summon this card from your hand by removing from play 1 face-up monster you control. If you do, return the removed from play monster to the field during the next Standby Phase.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: During either player's turn: You can discard this card; any effect damage you take this turn becomes 0.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: This card's name becomes "The Sanctuary in the Sky" while on the field or in the GY. Fairy monsters on the field gain 300 ATK/DEF. Set Spells/Traps cannot be targeted by, or destroyed by, card effects. Once per turn: You can target a total of 3 Fairy monsters and/or Counter Traps with different names in your GY; place them on top of your Deck in any order.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Battle Damage to the controller of a Fairy-Type monster from a battle involving that Fairy-Type monster becomes 0.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Remove from play 1 LIGHT Fairy-Type monster in your hand and draw 2 cards. You cannot Special Summon or conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Special Summon 1 Fairy-Type monster from your hand. That monster's ATK is halved, and it is destroyed during the End Phase.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Fairy-Type monster from your hand. You must control no monsters to activate and to resolve this effect.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Pay 2000 LP, then target 1 Level 4 or lower monster you control; for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, also Special Summon 2 monsters from your Deck, with the same Type, Attribute, and Level as that monster, but with different names from each other and that monster. You cannot conduct your Battle Phase the turn you activate this card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated: Reveal 1 Counter Trap in your hand, then discard 1 card and pay 1000 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, shuffle that card into the Deck. Then, you can Special Summon 1 "Parshath" monster from your Deck or Extra Deck.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: If "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is on the field, you can activate this card by discarding 1 LIGHT monster from your hand to the Graveyard. Choose 1 card your opponent controls or 1 in their hand (you can look at their hand), and send it to the Graveyard.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Target 1 of your banished Fairy monsters; Special Summon it. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Each time a Counter Trap Card is activated, Special Summon 1 "Synthetic Seraphim Token" (Fairy-Type/LIGHT/Level 1/ATK 300/DEF 300).

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: Activate only if "The Sanctuary in the Sky" is face-up on the field. Negate the activation of a Spell Card, Trap Card, or Effect Monster's effect, and destroy that card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When an opponent's Spell/Trap Card is activated: Your opponent draws 1 card, also negate the Spell/Trap activation, and if you do, destroy it.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When a monster(s) would be Summoned, OR when a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated that includes an effect that Special Summons a monster(s): Pay 2000 LP; negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated: Discard the same type of card (Monster, Spell, or Trap); negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When your opponent adds a card(s) from their Deck to their hand, including drawing: They must discard 1 of those cards.

extendedData.name: Description
extendedData.value: When your opponent activates a monster effect: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy that card, also your opponent draws 1 card.
